short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple browser extension to remove all fixed elements on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sick and tired of all the fixed elements preventing you from enjoying web content the way they are meant to be? Simply (1) install this extension, (2) hit <ctrl> + <shift> + U on your keyboard, and (3) ENJOY!
